name: Aby - baby dragon!
description:
Aby is a logic game for people of all ages. Develop logical thinking in children and helps adults pass the time. Intuitive controls. Tips at the beginning.


In the game you control a baby dragon named Aby. Show him the way to the apples to feed him. Aby's satiety increases when he eats 3 identical apples. Each of his steps on the field appear new apple.

Aby is the result of a combination of the "snake" and "match three" genres. And this result is an original game!
Compared to the classic snake, Aby is more like a turn-based strategy. Also, varieties of food are added here, and the goal of the game is not to fill the belly, but to saturate Aby. Take care of proper nutrition!
Compared to “three in a row”, in Aby you have more space for maneuvers. You can even go back one step if you want to take a different step.

Don't be afraid of innovations! At the beginning of the game, Aby will meet you and show you what to do.

Nice to play!
